full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL KHRAG ZOR 'PHEN BCAS CHOM RKUN CHINGS MDZAD MTHU LDAN ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B ('DI NI ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I DUR KHROD BDAG PO'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB BAR BA'I 'OD CES BYA BA DI'I BSKUL H'Um PAt SKRA SGROG KYIS MGO 'KHOR 'DON BAR BYA'O, ,CES PA 'DI NI CHOM RKUN CHINGS MDZAD MTHU LDAN ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA PADMA GA-YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA RIG 'DZIN, DGE SLONG BADZRA'I MING CAN GYIS DGOS PA'I DBANG BA'I 'PHRAL DU RING SUG MOS BRI'O, ,'DIS KYANG CHOM RKUN GNOD PA THAMS CAD LAS THAR BAR GYURO, ,)
